com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags
Class DefineEditText

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.Tag
      com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.DefinitionTag
          com.jswiff.swfrecords.tags.DefineEditText
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class DefineEditText
extends DefinitionTag

This tag defines a dynamic text field. A text field can be associated with a variable the contents of the text field are stored in and kept in sync with.

Users may change the value of a text field interactively, unless the readOnly tag is set.

Fonts used by this tag must be defined using DefineFont2 (not DefineFont). If the useOutlines flag is cleared, the Flash Player will try to render text using device fonts rather than glyph fonts.

When the html flag is set, the text may contain HTML tags. Allowed tags are:

  • <p>...</p>: paragraph
  • <br>: line break
  • <a href="...">...</a>: hyperlink. Optional attributes:
    • target: a window name
  • <font>...</font>: font properties. Available attributes:
    • face: font name supplied in a DefineFont2 tag.
    • size in twips (1/20 px). Leading + or - indicates a relative size
    • color as a #RRGGBB hex value
  • <b>...</b>: bold text
  • <i>...</i>: italic text
  • <u>...</u>: underlined text
  • <li>...</li>: bulleted list. Warning: <ul> is not supported
  • <textformat>...</textformat> lets you specify formatting attributes:
    • leftmargin in twips (1/20 px)
    • rightmargin in twips
    • indent in twips
    • blockindent in twips
    • leading in twips
    • tabstops: comma-separated list in twips
  • <tab>: advances to next tab stop (defined with <textformat>)

Multiple other parameters can be set, e.g. text layout attributes like margins and leading etc.

Since:
SWF 4
See Also:

Constructor Detail

DefineEditText

public DefineEditText(int characterId,
                      Rect bounds,
                      java.lang.String variableName)
Creates a new DefineEditText tag. Specify the character ID of the text field, its bounds and the name of the variable the contents of the text field are stored in and kept in sync with.

Parameters:
characterId - character ID of the text field
bounds - the size of the rectangle which completely encloses the text field.
variableName - variable name (in dot or slash syntax)

  • leading

isNoSelect

public boolean isNoSelect()
Checks if the noSelect flag is set. If set, the text cannot be interactively selected (and copied).

Returns:
true if noSelect flag set, otherwise false

isPassword

public boolean isPassword()
Checks whether the password flag is set. If set, the characters of the text are displayed as asterisks.

Returns:
true if password flag set, otherwise false

public boolean isReadOnly()
Checks whether the readOnly flag is set. If set, the text cannot be interactively edited.

Returns:
true if readOnly flag set, otherwise false

Returns:
true if useOutlines flag set, otherwise false

isWordWrap

public boolean isWordWrap()
Checks if the wordWrap flag is set. If set, the text will wrap at the end of the line.

Returns:
true if wordWrap flag set, otherwise false
